title: Understanding $$30-60-90$$ Triangles
text: In a $$30-60-90$$ triangle, the side opposite the 60-degree angle is always $$\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{3}$$ the length of the hypotenuse.

title: Calculate the Opposite Side
text: Given that the hypotenuse is $$\sqrt{3}$$ units, use the property of $$30-60-90$$ triangles to find the length of the side opposite the 60-degree angle.
